law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 57, effective June 15, 1950; and repealed in part ch. 176, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1950. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739j-42, 2739j-94.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Exemption of motor vehicles used for certain purposes.
